attributes.action: Allow anyone with a privet frozen pension to take full value at any time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To allow any person that has a privet pension which they are no long paying into, to have the full value of the fund to be returned to them if they wish. 
The money them can be re invested at the owner choosing into an Isa, or just to have the cash in the bank.
